title: Ruby On Rails Developer
description:
We’re looking for an experienced Ruby on Rails developer to crush it on a full-time basis. Your day-to-day will include building pure Rails web apps and APIs that interface with iOS, Android, and JavaScript front ends.

Our project teams are integrated – meaning you might join designers during sketch sessions or work alongside our Project Managers to help the team anticipate client needs. You’ll also take part in stand-ups, interface with clients, and mentor junior programmers, but we try to keep the meetings to a minimum. Mostly, you’ll code…and waste time on Slack.
lookingFor:
Your toolkit should include:

  • 2+ years of professional development experience
  • Advanced knowledge of Ruby on Rails
  • Heavy experience with TDD
  • Relational Database (PostgreSQL)
  • Linux based systems
  • HTML/CSS

And if you can tout the following, then wooo-weee!

  • JavaScript/CoffeeScript, and its 400+ frameworks
  • Experience with Agile
  • Volt/Opal
